path: {from: {contents: {body: $body, filename: $filename}}, authorID: $authorID, caption: $caption, customPostID: $customPostID, description: $description, slug: $slug, title: $title, altText: $altText, mimeType: $mimeType}

(input: {from: {contents: {body: $body, filename: $filename}}, authorID: $authorID, caption: $caption, customPostID: $customPostID, description: $description, slug: $slug, title: $title, altText: $altText, mimeType: $mimeType})

createMediaItem(input: {from: {contents: {body: $body, filename: $filename}}, authorID: $authorID, caption: $caption, customPostID: $customPostID, description: $description, slug: $slug, title: $title, altText: $altText, mimeType: $mimeType}) { ... }

mutation TestCreateMediaItemFromContents($username: String! = "editor", $body: String!, $filename: String!, $authorID: ID, $caption: String, $customPostID: ID, $description: String, $slug: String, $title: String, $altText: String, $mimeType: AllowedMimeTypeEnumString) { ... }
extensions.field: createMediaItem(input: {from: {contents: {body: $body, filename: $filename}}, authorID: $authorID, caption: $caption, customPostID: $customPostID, description: $description, slug: $slug, title: $title, altText: $altText, mimeType: $mimeType}) { ... }
